objects.text:
925 Sterling Silver
Authentic Pink Wreath Design
Perfect Gift for Her
6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and feminine aesthetic designed to promote a jewelry product. The layout is split diagonally with a soft pink gradient background on the upper left transitioning to a richer rose pink shade on the bottom right. Prominently displayed in the center-right is an image of elegant rose gold earrings (identified as "product_image"). The headline ("heading_1" and "heading_2") is bold and uppercase in a deep burgundy hue, emphasizing luxury and style. Below it, a subheading ("subheading") in muted rose aligns with the theme. The description text ("description") lists key product features in a professional sans-serif. The price ("price") is bold and clearly visible in burgundy, paired with a rounded rectangular call-to-action button featuring "SHOP NOW" ("cta") in white text over a muted rose background ("cta_background").

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blush (#F8E7E9)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Rich Rose (#C27777)
- Deep Burgundy (#9E4244)
- Dark Maroon (#7D3638)
product_color: The product image showcases a delicate pair of earrings featuring a soft rose gold metal base (#F4A6A6) complemented by brilliant white crystals (#FFFFFF) and transparent teardrop gems with a light silver shimmer (#D4D4D4). The rose gold forms intricate floral outlines that harmoniously encircle the gems, enhancing their luminance while providing warmth and luxury. The color palette can include Rose Gold (#F4A6A6), Soft Blush Pink (#FADADD), Diamond White (#FFFFFF), Pale Silver (#D4D4D4), and Coral Pink (#F7B4B4). These colors blend smoothly, with highlights focusing on the contrast between the pink warmth and the crystalline sparkle to emphasize elegance and sophistication.
